actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for the reclassification of positions of United States Border Control Agents.

summary.text: Reclassifies the positions of United States Border Patrol agents in recognition of their unique responsibilities. Advances agents presently employed at levels of GS-5, GS-7, and GS-9 to levels of GS-7, GS-9, and GS-11, respectively. Classifies agents who, on a regular basis, may be responsible for identifying and questioning persons suspected of violating immigration and nationality laws at a GS-12 level. Classifies agents who are responsible for the operation and coordination of intelligence programs and for providing certain advance intelligence information at the GS-13 level.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for the reclassification of positions of United States Border Control Agents.
